rows.label: qst202603_msg0001
rows.name: Welcome. We've been expecting you.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0002
rows.name:
Whoa, I didn't expect you to be
meeting us personally, Your Majesty!

rows.label: qst202603_msg0003
rows.name: Tora feeling like Very Important Nopon!

rows.label: qst202603_msg0004
rows.name:
We are honored that you would come
to speak with us in person.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0005
rows.name: Raise your head, Melep-dono.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0006
rows.name:
It's I who should apologize for meeting
you in such a place.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0007
rows.name:
But I'm afraid time is of the essence.
We can't afford luxuries.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0008
rows.name: Could you inform us of the situation?

rows.label: qst202603_msg0009
rows.name: I was just about to.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0010
rows.name:
At present, we've confirmed two
Herridot Laias in Invidia. We've had to
make three strategic retreats already.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0012
rows.name: Three retreats?! Sheesh...

rows.label: qst202603_msg0013
rows.name:
Indeed. Our army has a mere handful
of Drivers, so we haven't been able to
put up much of a fight thus far.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0014
rows.name:
We recruited the Merc Group as well,
but they failed to subjugate it, being
an unfamiliar species.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0015
rows.name:
We just don't have the means to deal
with them with our current capabilities.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0024
rows.name:
That is why we entreated you to bring
the Holy Grail and any other competent
Blades you may have to help us.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0016
rows.name:
Gotcha. Time to bust us up some
Herridot Laias then!

rows.label: qst202603_msg0017
rows.name: It would be most appreciated.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0018
rows.name:
The Herridot Laias are presently
on the far side of Gullet Pass.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0019
rows.name: It will be done.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0020
rows.name: Ten'i...think you're up to this?

rows.label: qst202603_msg0021
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: qst202603_msg0022
rows.name:
Let's dispatch the enemy at the
earliest opportunity.
